PLCRVoting.rescueTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#316-321) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(isExpired(pollMap[_pollID].revealEndDate)) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#317)

PLCRVoting.revealVote (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#420-444) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! pollMap[_pollID].didReveal[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#425-426)
	- require(bool)(pollMap[_pollID].didCommit[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#422-423)

PLCRVoting.getNumPassingTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#469-482) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

PLCRVoting.isExpired (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fd334b18ba6e9af6f4da9e2ea99aa490db211f3.sol#706-707) uses timestamp for comparisons
